Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25431 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25431 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package fluent-bit is earlier than 3.0.6-3, affected by CVE-2024-25431
